Posts.Content: Billster84 wrote: This has been a very long 8 weeks.... Suppose to start chemo next week. Ct scan came back with liver spots so i have gone from “its going to be a rough year" to “not sure ill be here in a year" Mri is suppose to take place sometime in the next 10 days. Im in complete panic, i have been so calm during this whole process until the nurse called me to tell me that today. I'm really struggling to stay positive. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Spots on liver Billster84 Egads007

Posts.Content: Billster84 wrote: hi friends, I finished chemo June 26/18 and my cancer breast is sore, it’s uncomfortable most of the time and then i get these sharp pains.... any one else? I already left a msg at the oncologist office Log in to post a reply
